headline.main: 2 Plead Not Guilty in Kentucky Student's Death, 3rd Charged

headline.main: 2 Ex-Inmates in Georgia Accused of Pennsylvania Jury Scam
headline.print_headline: 2 Ex-Inmates in Georgia Accused of Pennsylvania Jury Scam

docs.snippet: Two former Georgia state prison inmates have been jailed there on charges they phoned western Pennsylvania residents and scammed six into wiring $990 each, supposedly to pay fines for missing jury duty....

headline.main: Struggling Hanover Replace Korkut With Frontzeck

headline.main: Nuclear Waste Drums Appear Stable After Signs of Reactions
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Waste Drums Appear Stable After Signs of Reactions

docs.snippet: Dozens of drums of radioactive waste at one of the nation's premier weapons laboratories are stable after some showed signs of chemical reactions over the past year, according to federal officials....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of drums of radioactive waste at one of the nation's premier weapons laboratories are stable after some showed signs of chemical reactions over the past year, according to federal officials.

headline.main: World's oldest person says faith the key to longevity
headline.sub: World's oldest person says faith the key to longevity

docs.snippet: "Everything comes from above," says Jeralean Talley, 115 years old and the world's oldest-known living person, crediting her faith for her longevity. Katharine Jackson reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: "Everything comes from above," says Jeralean Talley, 115 years old and the world's oldest-known living person, crediting her faith for her longevity. Katharine Jackson reports.

headline.main: Palestinian Ministers Cut Short Gaza Visit Over Dispute With Hamas
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Ministers Cut Short Gaza Visit Over Dispute With Hamas

docs.snippet: Palestinian cabinet ministers from the occupied West Bank cut short a visit to Gaza on Monday over disputes between the Western-backed Fatah movement and Islamist group Hamas which dominates the territory, officials said....
